title: Fake GPS Controller Pro v2.0 APK [SadeemPC]
description:
Fake GPS Controller Pro v2.0
Requirements: Android 4.1 and up

This app is intended to aid in testing & development of GPS related apps, but can also be useful in a variety of other situations. For example, if your GPS readings are inaccurate this app can help workaround that. Or, it can be used to save battery life without completely disabling your Location settings.	

Features: 
- Fake, mock, or spoof your GPS coordinates to any location. 
- Simple, intuitive user interface with integrated map and search. 
- The best spoofing algorithm in existence. 

Many additional features such as: 
- Customizable GPS parameters. 
- Support for rooted device & mock location disabled. 
- Simulated walking mode 

General Usage: 
1. Tap the map once at your desired location and then click the "Play" button to start spoofing. 
2. For best results set Location mode to DEVICE ONLY and disable Wi-Fi and Bluetooth scanning. 

What's New:
- Added optional GPS status overlay.
- Reworked the Settings screen and refactored mocking into 3 distinct modes: Basic, Advanced, and Expert.

Homepage 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gpscontroller
